title: Senior Privacy Engineer
description: The Governance team manages risk and compliance objectives, specifically risks about data, products, and software systems within Google.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 4 years of experience working in a privacy-related field.
preferred_qualifications: Experience supporting product launches or familiarity with product launch lifecycle. Knowledge of common regulatory frameworks (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).
responsibilities: Conduct technical and quantitative analysis to drive scalable, efficient, and data-driven privacy decision-making. Design, architect, and lead implementation of privacy-enhancing solutions alongside engineering teams.
